eu_initiatives: All initiatives in the areas of environmental protection, trade, financial and monetary union, energy and internal market, such as the recast of the fertilizer regulation, REACH, EU's free trade agreement negotiations, Brexit negotiations and tax transparency discussions/legislation and connected automated driving.

goals__remit: Koch Companies Public Sector, LLC seeks to ensure that the Koch Companies have the best possible public sector environment in which to freely practice Principled Entrepreneurship(TM) by systematically applying Market-Based Management(TM).
